title: Kumail Nanjiani | Karen Chee on Celebrating Asian Pacific American Heritage Month
description:
Late Night writer Karen Chee shares the ways she is celebrating her heritage during Asian and Pacific Islander American Heritage Month.

Then, Seth talks to actor, writer and comedian Kumail Nanjiani.
